statements: DELETE FROM temperature_control WHERE batch_id = 101 AND temperature < 50.5
DELETE FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature >= 60 AND batch_id IN (SELECT batch_id FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature > 55)
DELETE FROM storage_temperature WHERE temperature > 25 AND drug_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM temperature_logs WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-01' AND temperature_record < 0.0;
DELETE FROM TemperatureReadings WHERE temperature > 30 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TemperatureReadings WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
DELETE FROM DrugInventory WHERE quantity <= 0 AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM TemperatureReading WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND temperature < 0.0;
